description:

comments.content:
Thanks for taking the time to report this issue! Please double check your setup and try troubleshooting via support channels like #openstack on irc or mailing lists. If you determine this isn't a configuration issue, please reopen this bug and provide the following information:
- OS type and version
- Nova version
- Full stack trace (api logs)
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~auggy

comments.content:
Hi everyone. I am also experiencing the same problem. Does anybody have any solutions to this ? 
(FUEL 7.0 on Virtualbox. 1 Controller 1 Compute node, Ubuntu 14.04)
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~hkominos

comments.content:
replace the attached file and let me know,

Before replacing please take the backup.

/usr/local/lib/python2.7/dist-packages/novadocker/virt/docker/driver.py
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~balaji-shanmugam
